lines: 1. Amashiwi ya Mupusushi,Umfwa yali aya mweo,
Uyasakamane umfwa Yes' ati, "Balishu-ka basu-nge funde."
Balishu-ka bo bacite funde, Balishuka-, balishuka;
Balishu-ka bo bacite funde, Bali-shuka, balishuka.
2. Ukulau-mfwa amafunde, Pamo na ma-layo yakwe,
Kuyomfwa, kutina, tacili kantu, Balishu-ka abo bacita.
3. Bena bakengila mu mâ€™sumba, Tabakasa-ngwe no bubi;
Bakashi-lishiwa ukwape na pe, Bakalya ku muti wa mweo.
